comment._content: Oi! Sou administrador de um grupo chamado Mouseion - Convide/comente/premie suas fotografias favoritas e nós adoraríamos ter isto adicionado ao grupo! Espetáculo de imagem!

comment._content: not much of the 'Wood' left there :(

comment.author: 34027481@N03
comment._content: Considering the technology of the time, an amazingly lucky capture.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
26022992@N07
comment._content: Frank Hurley was, of course, the Australian photographer who went to Antarctica with Sir Ernest Shackleton on the fateful  voyage of 'The Endurance' 1914-16. On return to Europe after the rescue he became an official war photographer in WW1. I cannot comment on the accuracy of who actually took the photo in question.
